constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 35 (Wednesday, February 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. McBATH:
H.R. 1274.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 4: The Times, Places and Manner of
holding Elections for Senators and Representatives, shall be
prescribed in each State by the Legislature thereof; but the
Congress may at any time by Law make or alter such
Regulations, except as to the Places of choosing Senators.
[Page H617]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

title: Election Official Integrity Act of 2021
